com.github.mikephil.charting.listener

Interface OnDrawListener


  • public interface OnDrawListener
    Listener for callbacks when drawing on the chart.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDrawFinished(DataSet<?> dataSet)
      Called when drawing finger is lifted and the draw is finished.
      void onEntryAdded(Entry entry)
      Called whenever an entry is added with the finger.
      void onEntryMoved(Entry entry)
      Called whenever an entry is moved by the user after beeing highlighted

    • Method Detail

      • onEntryAdded

        void onEntryAdded(Entry entry)
        Called whenever an entry is added with the finger. Note this is also called for entries that are generated by the library, when the touch gesture is too fast and skips points.
        Parameters:
        entry - the last drawn entry
